response.overview: When his brother-in-law runs afoul of a drug lord, family man Chris Farraday turns to a skill he abandoned long ago—smuggling—to repay the debt. But the job goes wrong, and Farraday finds himself wanted by cops, crooks and killers alike.
response.tagline: What would you hide to protect your family?
response.title: Contraband

results.name: Mark Wahlberg Does His Own Stunts in Contraband | Bonus Feature Spotlight
Chris talks to Sebastian at an AA meeting
Chris asks Briggs if they can work out a deal
Chris tells Kate he is going to do another run
Chris is interrogated by customs officers
Briggs and his crew approach Chris after he gets off the boat
